content: this pattern is a super airy very easy mesh face scrubby washbag to wash facial rounds and face scrubbies in no more losing them in the washing machine this pattern is part of the calm clusters spa set with 4 patterns all free to view on the website **recommended yarn** any soft cotton #3 dk weight yarn approx 49 2yds/45m 0 64oz/18g **hooks & other materials** us size 7 4 5mm yarn needle stitch marker sharp scissors **skill level** easy **sizes/finished measurements** size is approximate 6 15cm x 5 12 5cm **are you on my email list ** i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 2 **note on selling items and copyright** the pattern and all images are copyright janferie mackintosh all rights reserved please do not copy or share any part of this document you may print it for your own use please do not alter it and try to claim it as your own pattern you may not use photographs of this pattern without permission you may not make tutorial videos from this pattern you may sell finished items handmade in small quantities by you design credit is appreciated thank you **please note that instant download pdfs files cannot be refunded ** 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/2024/08/26/free-calm-clusters-spa-crochet-along-cal/ 2 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
